product_name: Sea to Summit Travelling Light Toiletry Bag - Large
long_description: The large Sea to Summit Travelling Light Toiletry bag is for weight-conscious travelers. And although made from a lightweight fabric, this bag stands up on its own so it's easy to access the contents.
short_description: The large Sea to Summit Travelling Light Toiletry bag is for weight-conscious travelers. And although made from a lightweight fabric, this bag stands up on its own so it's easy to access the contents.
